meanings.definition: Having a strong desire or craving for food.
meanings.sent1: After playing outside all day, I felt hungrier than ever.
meanings.sent2: She always gets hungrier when she smells freshly baked cookies.
meanings.sent3: I joked that my stomach was so loud, it must be hungrier than a bear.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the sizzling bacon made me even hungrier than before.
meanings.sent5: His stomach growled loudly, signaling that he was getting hungrier by the minute.

meanings.sent1: As the competition progressed, the team grew hungrier for victory.
meanings.sent2: The young entrepreneur was hungrier for success than anyone else in the industry.
meanings.sent3: Her desire to learn new skills made her hungrier for knowledge every day.
meanings.sent4: The artist's hunger for creativity only grew hungrier with each completed masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: His ambition to climb higher in his career made him hungrier for opportunities.
